verbose_text: KGF is also expressed by lung mesenchyme (39, 40), and is known to be essential for lung development; in particular, KGF induces an increase in surfactant DSPC synthesis and expression of three of the four surfactant protein genes, namely sftpa, sftpb, and sftpc in fetal rat type II cells [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR] and KGF exhibits protective functions on injured lung epithelia [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: KGF induces an increase in surfactant DSPC
